Package org.github.fussel178.telestion.extension.corfu.corfu.mapper

Class PayloadFieldArrays

java.lang.Object
org.github.fussel178.telestion.extension.corfu.corfu.mapper.PayloadFieldArrays
public class PayloadFieldArrays extends Object
Utility class to handle arrays of PayloadFields in a better way.

  • Method Details

    • from

      public static PayloadField[] from​(RecordComponent[] components, CorfuPayloadMapper serializer)
      Transforms an array of record components to payload fields.
      Parameters:
      components - the array of record components
      serializer - the serializer that the payload fields should receive during creation
      Returns:
      an array of payload fields that wrap the given record components

    • getTypes

      public static Class<?>[] getTypes​(PayloadField[] fields)
      Returns an array of class types representing the types of the payloads fields.
      Parameters:
      fields - the payload fields that specify the class types
      Returns:
      an array of class types

    • size

      public static int size​(PayloadField[] fields)
      Returns the size of an array of payload fields by summing up all individual sizes of every payload field.
      Parameters:
      fields - the payload fields to measure
      Returns:
      the size of all payload fields

    • serialize

      public static void serialize​(PayloadField[] fields, PrimitiveOutputStream stream, AppTelecommandPayload payload) throws CorfuSerializationException
      Serializes an array of payload fields to its binary formats.
      Parameters:
      fields - the payload fields to serialize
      stream - the stream that accepts the encoded binary data
      payload - the payload object that contains the actual values that should be encoded
      Throws:
      CorfuSerializationException - if errors happen during serialization

    • deserialize

      public static Object[] deserialize​(PayloadField[] fields, PrimitiveInputStream stream) throws CorfuDeserializationException
      Deserializes an array of payload fields from its binary formats to an array of Java objects.
      Parameters:
      fields - the payload fields to deserialize
      stream - the stream that provides the encoded binary format
      Returns:
      an array of Java objects representing the deserialized values in the order of payload fields
      Throws:
      CorfuDeserializationException - if errors happen during deserialization

    • toTypeString

      public static String toTypeString​(PayloadField[] fields)
      Stringifies the class type binary names of all payload fields.
      Parameters:
      fields - the payload fields that specify the class types
      Returns:
      a string that contains the binary name of all class types
